meanings.definition: The quality present in a thing or person that gives intense pleasure or deep satisfaction to the mind, whether arising from sensory manifestations (as shape, color, sound, etc.), a meaningful design or pattern, or something else (as a personality in which high spiritual qualities are manifest).
meanings.sent1: The beauties of nature filled her heart with joy.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beauties of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The beauties of the garden made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was one of the beauties that shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The beauties of the symphony echoed in her soul.

meanings.definition: A beautiful person, especially a woman.
meanings.sent1: She was known as one of the beauties of the town.
meanings.sent2: The actress was considered one of the beauties of the era.
meanings.sent3: The beauties at the party turned heads wherever they went.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance made her stand out among the beauties.
meanings.sent5: The beauties in the painting seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: A beautiful thing, as a work of art or a building.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed many ancient beauties.
meanings.sent2: The cathedral was one of the architectural beauties of the city.
meanings.sent3: The beauties of the sculpture captivated all who saw it.
meanings.sent4: The old library was a hidden beauty in the town.
meanings.sent5: The beauties of the landscape painting were breathtaking.
